description: This PHP source file provides a web interface for adding a blocked keyword in a parental control settings page. It includes HTML form elements, JavaScript for client-side validation and interaction, and references to external PHP includes and AJAX handler PHP scripts.

methods.name: updateBlockTimeVisibility
methods.description: Shows or hides time selection fields based on the 'Always Block' switch state.

methods.name: AJAX form submit handler
methods.description: Handles form submission: validates input, computes times, and sends AJAX request to add a blocked keyword.
